body:
## Release Notes

- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#203)
- Add nodejs 20.x to the list of CI targets. @iphydf (#185)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#178)
- Fix buildifier formatting. @iphydf (#159)
- Fix CI; add docker build for local reproducibility. @iphydf (#158)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#157)
- [Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities @snyk-bot (#40)
- Add copyright notice and SPDX license identifiers. @iphydf (#37)
- Run "prettier" on all js/ts code and enforce on Travis. @iphydf (#34)
- Fix coverage reporting. @iphydf (#36)
- Remove unused "else" case and throw errors in its case. @iphydf (#35)
- Run PR travis builds with the newest and oldest supported node. @iphydf (#33)
- Fix some syntax errors and minor style fixes. @iphydf (#31)
- Remove support for nodejs 4-7. @iphydf (#32)
- Add coveralls integration for js-toxcore-c. @iphydf (#23)
- Upgrade most dependencies to their latest version. @iphydf (#22)
- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#30)
- Remove the extra "g++" install. @iphydf (#24)
- Stop trying to build for ancient node.js versions. @iphydf (#21)
- Disable bazel build while I figure out how rules_nodejs works. @iphydf (#20)
- fix failing to convert key to hex @Sorunome (#19)
- Fix compiling on newer node versions @Sorunome (#18)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#16)
- Add package-lock.json to repository. @iphydf (#15)
- Prepare for js-toxcore-c 0.2.0 release. @iphydf (#13)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#11)
- Enable bazel build in js-toxcore-c. @iphydf (#10)
- Add "latest node version" to the build matrix. @iphydf (#9)
- Add more node.js versions to the matrix. @iphydf (#8)
- Use https for downloading opus. @iphydf (#7)
- Use markdown license for GPLv3. @iphydf (#6)
- Only build master branch on Travis. @iphydf (#4)
- Update js-toxcore-c to new toxencryptsave API. @iphydf (#5)
- Increase timeout for a test from 2 to 5 seconds. @iphydf (#3)
- Use non-sudo on Travis; add TokTok support. @iphydf (#2)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Disable js-toxcore-c CI. @iphydf (#212)
- Make it possible to run npm format on Windows @robinlinden (#128)
- [Snyk] Security upgrade underscore from 1.10.2 to 1.12.1 @snyk-bot (#91)
- [Snyk] Security upgrade ffi-napi from 2.5.0 to 3.0.0 @snyk-bot (#52)
- Require CI to pass before merging PRs. @iphydf (#111)
- Upgrade to GitHub-native Dependabot @[dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview) (#98)
- Migrate CI to GitHub Actions @robinlinden (#94)
- Skip all branch builds. @iphydf (#43)

## Maintenance (Dependencies)

- Bump underscore from 1.13.6 to 1.13.7 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#201)
- Bump mocha from 10.3.0 to 10.4.0 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#189)
- Bump prettier from 2.0.5 to 3.2.5 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#182)
- Bump mocha from 10.2.0 to 10.3.0 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#183)
- Bump es5-ext from 0.10.53 to 0.10.63 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#184)
- Bump mocha from 3.5.3 to 10.2.0 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#151)
- Bump mktemp from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#177)
- Bump underscore from 1.13.2 to 1.13.6 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#147)
- Bump grunt-shell from 3.0.1 to 4.0.0 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#137)
- Bump y18n from 4.0.0 to 4.0.3 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#172)
- Bump grunt from 1.4.0 to 1.6.1 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#153)
- Bump @babel/traverse from 7.10.1 to 7.23.7 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#162)
- Bump node-fetch from 2.6.6 to 2.7.0 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#166)
- Bump async from 3.2.3 to 3.2.5 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#165)
- Bump moment from 2.24.0 to 2.30.1 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#171)
- Bump ansi-regex from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#161)
- Bump lodash from 4.17.15 to 4.17.21 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#163)
- Bump json5 from 2.1.3 to 2.2.3 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#160)
- Bump jsdoc from 3.6.7 to 4.0.2 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#155)
- Bump underscore from 1.13.1 to 1.13.2 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#129)
- Bump async from 3.2.2 to 3.2.3 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#130)
- Bump jsdoc from 3.6.4 to 3.6.7 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#124)
- Bump codecov from 3.7.1 to 3.8.3 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#122)
- Bump underscore from 1.12.1 to 1.13.1 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#123)
- Bump ffi-napi from 3.0.0 to 4.0.3 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#121)
- Bump grunt from 1.1.0 to 1.4.0 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#125)
- Bump async from 3.2.0 to 3.2.2 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#115)
- Bump ref-array-napi from 1.2.1 to 1.2.2 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#112)
- Bump codecov from 3.7.0 to 3.8.3 @[dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot) (#117)
- Upgrade to GitHub-native Dependabot @[dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview) (#98)
- Bump nyc from 15.0.1 to 15.1.0 @[dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview) (#49)
- Bump ref-array-napi from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 @[dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview) (#41)
- Bump codecov from 3.6.5 to 3.7.0 @[dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview) (#45)
- Bump ref-struct-napi from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 @[dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview) (#42)
name: v0.1.0
